        public void startGame(String... lauchParameters)
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Start the game up after it's been initialized
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface Game
        Parameters:
        lauchParameters - the start parameters can be used for multi game environments or startup options. These are not needed for every type of game, no need to use them

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame(String... endParameters)
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Stop the game
        Specified by:
        stopGame in interface Game
        Parameters:
        endParameters - these are used for passing data to the game when stopped, once again, not always needed, but they are there if needed
